entry.title: Emerging Technology: The Future of Mobile Commerce

media:group.media:title: Emerging Technology: The Future of Mobile Commerce
media:group.media:description:
2020 has marked a major shift in shopping—from store closures and e-commerce growth, to a heightened demand for contactless in-store payments—and the small screen plays a big part.
To learn more about emerging technologies like Virtual and Augmented Reality, visit Gartner.com/marketing.

media:group.media:title: In Focus: Domino's Pizza Loyalty
media:group.media:description:
Loyalty programs can be excellent opportunities to drivers for recurring customers—but only if they’re convinced to come back. So, what is Domino’s Pizza serving up that has customers coming back for seconds?
Jason Yu of Gartner For Marketers explains the best practices demonstrated by the pizza giant.
In Focus spotlights best-in-class brand efforts across platforms and tactics. To learn more, visit Gartner.com/marketing.

entry.title: Emerging Technology: AR/VR and the E-Commerce Experience

media:group.media:title: Emerging Technology: AR/VR and the E-Commerce Experience
media:group.media:description:
Sure, e-commerce gains can help offset in-store losses…but can the in-store experience itself be replicated online? Thanks to developments in augmented and virtual reality tools, the answer might be yes.
To learn more about emerging technologies like Virtual and Augmented Reality, visit Gartner.com/marketing.

entry.title: An Invitation for Prospective Clients: Gartner For Marketers

media:group.media:title: An Invitation for Prospective Clients: Gartner For Marketers

entry.title: Gartner Digital Intelligence Report: Customer Service 2020

media:group.media:title: Gartner Digital Intelligence Report: Customer Service 2020
media:group.media:description:
While e-commerce growth is projected to continue at a steady clip, strong online customer service can be a dealbreaker for shoppers. So, how are brands responding?
Across self-service functionalities like guided selling tools and chatbots, and assisted channels like live chat and social media, brands are making worthwhile digital customer service investments—but is it enough to keep up with consumers’ evolving expectations?
The 2020 Gartner report on Customer Service details the efforts of 118 brands across ten industries. To learn more, visit Gartner.com/marketing.

media:group.media:title: In Focus: e.l.f.'s TikTok Success
media:group.media:description:
TikTok, the video-sharing app that’s skyrocketed in popularity, is a good reminder that social media prowess isn’t a one-size-fits-all affair.
Katie Groody, Research Principal of Beauty at Gartner for Marketers, focuses on e.l.f. Cosmetics, whose winning TikTok strategy demonstrates the importance of understanding platforms’ nuances and audience expectations.
In Focus spotlights best-in-class brand efforts across platforms and tactics. To learn more, visit Gartner.com/marketing.

entry.title: Gartner Digital IQ Index: Restaurants US 2019

media:group.media:title: Gartner Digital IQ Index: Restaurants US 2019
media:group.media:description:
Restaurant sales have surpassed grocery sales as diners increasingly eat in. Are restaurant brands prepared to cater to contemporary consumer needs?
From function-rich mobile apps to robust loyalty programs, restaurant brands are pulling all the stops. But are their efforts enough to satisfy hungry shoppers?
The 2019 Gartner Digital IQ Index for Restaurants US benchmarks the digital competence of 77 restaurant brands. To learn more, visit Gartner.com/marketing.

entry.title: Marketing in Uncertain Times: What Brands Can Learn From China

media:group.media:title: Marketing in Uncertain Times: What Brands Can Learn From China
media:group.media:description:
While Coronavirus began to disrupt the U.S. in February 2020, it has been an ongoing crisis in China since December of last year. What can marketers learn from global brands’ responses in China?
For more insights and toolkits on leading your marketing organization through times of uncertainty, visit Gartner.com or reach out to your executive advisor.

entry.title: Marketing in Uncertain Times: Managing Marketing Costs

media:group.media:title: Marketing in Uncertain Times: Managing Marketing Costs
media:group.media:description:
In the wake of the disruption that organizations are facing in the midst of COVID-19 and its ensuing effect on global markets, managing and optimizing marketing costs is essential. What steps should CMOs take to ensure they can respond accordingly?
For more insights and toolkits on leading your marketing organization through times of uncertainty, visit Gartner.com or reach out to your executive advisor.

entry.title: Marketing in Uncertain Times: Marketing to Anxious Consumers

media:group.media:title: Marketing in Uncertain Times: Marketing to Anxious Consumers
media:group.media:description:
While the Coronavirus epidemic has been at the forefront of concerns across the United States, Gartner research reveals that concerns about climate change, fears of economic recession and racial tensions were already weighing on consumers' minds. Here are several tips for compassionate communications in the midst of this situation.
For more insights and toolkits on leading your marketing organization through times of uncertainty, visit Gartner.com or reach out to your executive advisor.

entry.title: Marketing in Uncertain Times: Marketing and Agility

media:group.media:title: Marketing in Uncertain Times: Marketing and Agility
media:group.media:description:
Gartner research indicates all organizations are currently facing some level of disruption due to COVID-19. In times of disruption, agility is more important than ever. So what steps can your brand take to ensure you’re able to remain nimble in the wake of Coronavirus?
For more insights and toolkits on leading your marketing organization through times of uncertainty, visit Gartner.com or reach out to your executive advisor.

media:group.media:title: Ewan McIntyre on Cost Optimization
media:group.media:description:
Considering the current economic climate, cost optimization is an essential step for CMOs to demonstrate the value their department can deliver to the wider organization.
What efforts can be taken to ensure that marketing is seen as a value driver, rather than an expenditure?
Ewan McIntyre, VP Analyst at Gartner for Marketers, touches on key considerations for CMOs. To learn more, visit Gartner.com/marketing.

entry.title: Gartner Digital IQ Index: Top American & European Luxury Brands in Digital 2019

media:group.media:title: Gartner Digital IQ Index: Top American & European Luxury Brands in Digital 2019
media:group.media:description:
In the wake of worsening economic conditions and unreliable department store retail, luxury brands are increasingly turning towards direct-to-consumer sales for revenue. But are they reaching the right demographic?
As Gen Z represents an increasing share of shoppers, brands need to retool their digital strategies to successfully cater to the future of luxury consumers.
The 2019 Gartner Digital IQ Index for Luxury US & Europe benchmarks the digital competence of 101 brands. To learn more, visit Gartner.com/marketing.
